data.text:
In Afghanistan: The Ashraf Ghani presidency, NATO withdrawal, and pursuit of peace

…leading candidates, Abdullah Abdullah and Ashraf Ghani, followed in June. A preliminary count placed Ghani ahead, but Abdullah demanded a recount, charging that as many as two million of the ballots for Ghani were fraudulent. With both candidates claiming victory, a period of deadlock followed. In July, under pressure from…

In Hamid Karzai: Presidency

…was signed by Karzai’s successor, Ashraf Ghani, just days after he took office in September 2014.
